name: Russian Car Parking Simulator 3D
description:
Fan of the Russian car industry? Can not live without your favorite Vaz or Lada? Then this game is for you!

Parking Russian Cars 3D - a unique game experience parking Russian cars, from Vaz 2101, popularly known as the penny, ending Lada 2170 known as Priora.

How to Play:
Use the controller steering with pedals and park your car in the box. Come interesting levels, including parking in the daytime and at night, but watch the time! And of course, try not to damage your car!

Feel like a Russian driver in the car park of the new 3D. Use your reaction and coordination, and park your car in the box. Successful parking!

Main Features:
- Amazing 3D graphics and full auto detailing
- Intuitive controls
- Realistic physics
- User-friendly interface
- Full Russian fleet of trucks Vaz 2101, popularly known as the penny, ending Lada 2170 Priora known as
- Complete interior detailing and interior auto
- Over 20 unique levels, including day and night parking

Want to drive a real car? Parking Russian Machines 3D is for you! Best simulator with three-dimensional graphics are absolutely free to you!
